items.sentence: Tom was watching the news when Mary entered the room.
Why don\'t you just say you don\'t like Chinese food?
Tom will probably go hiking with us if we invite him.
Do I look like a guy who doesn\'t want to go jogging?
I\'m glad I didn\'t do everything Tom asked me to do.
Tom started questioning Mary about where she\'d been.
Are you still convinced Tom was the one who did that?
Don\'t you think Tom is behind what\'s happening now?
Don\'t you think that that\'s a little too expensive?
Tom is now able to communicate in French fairly well.
